channel.title: Akash Gupta| Data Analyst
channel.description: Recent content on Akash Gupta| Data Analyst

item.title: Sales Performance Dashboard â€“ Excel
item.description:
Ankita-Store-Date-Analysis (Interactive Dashboard creation using MS Excel)

  • Developed an interactive sales performance dashboard in Excel, incorporating pivot tables, slicers, and dynamic charts.
  • Visualized key performance indicators (KPIs), including total sales and regional performance metrics, enabling quick executive reporting and informed decision support.

Project Objective

The Ankita store want to create an annual store report for 2024. So that, The owner of Ankita store can understand their customer purchase behaviour and buying habit and can grow their sales in 2025.

item.title: Netflix Content Analysis â€“ PostgreSQL & SQL
item.description:
Netflix Movies and TV Shows Data Analysis using SQL

  • Analyzed over 6,000 Netflix titles using PostgreSQL to identify content trends by genre, release year, and country.
  • Identified significant shifts in original content production and key global content hubs, delivering actionable business insights through the use of joins, CTEs, and aggregations.

Overview

This Project involves a comprehensive analysis of Netflix’s movies and TV Shows data using SQL. The is to extract various valuable insights and answers various business questions based on the dataset. The following README provides a detailed of the project’s objectives, business problems, solutions.

item.title: SmartDash - AI Powered Dashboard
item.description:
ðŸ‘‰ An AI-ready, user-friendly analytics dashboard for small businesses.

SmartDash is a lightweight web app that turns raw sales CSV files into instant insights.

Use cases:

  • Small shops analyzing monthly sales
  • Quick product/region performance checks

âœ¨ Key Features

  • Auto Column Detection for Date, Product, Quantity, Price/Revenue (with manual selectors if needed)
  • Interactive Filters: Category, Region, Sales Rep (when available in data)
  • KPI Cards: Total Revenue, Units Sold, Avg Order Value, Top Product/Region
  • Charts: Sales trend (monthly), Top 5 Products, Revenue by Region
  • Insights: Quick bullets(seasonality, best weekday, best rep, low performers)
  • Export: Filtered CSV + styled PDF report (light-blue theme + logo placeholder)
  • Mobile-friendly layout with scrollable preview
  • Session-aware: Remembers user selections across uploads in the same session

ðŸ–¼ Demo Screens

Homepage

item.title: Interactive Sales Insights â€“ Tableau Public
item.description:
Sales Insights Dashboard in Tableau

  • Built an interactive Tableau sales dashboard featuring dynamic filters, KPIs, and visual
    breakdowns by region, time, and sub-category to deliver clear business insights.
  • Enabled data-driven decision-making by highlighting performance trends, optimizing
    storytelling with clean layout, and showcasing key profit and quantity metrics.

Overview

This project presents an interactive Tableau Sales Dashboard that consolidates key performance indicators (KPIs) for sales analysis. It enables users to monitor sales trends, revenue distribution, and performance by categories such as product, region, and time. The dashboard is designed for business managers and analysts to quickly understand performance drivers.
